alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Clinch; Coffee; Echols; Northern Ware; Southern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 6:16AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton, southeastern Coffee, Echols, Atkinson, northwestern Ware and Clinch Counties through 700 AM EST... At 615 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pearson to 7 miles north of Mayday to 6 miles west of Madison. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homerville, Pearson, Jennings, Argyle, Statenville, Du Pont, Mayday, Crossroads, Manor and Blue Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST for southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Atkinson; Clinch; Coffee; Echols; Northern Ware; Southern Ware
